comment.body:
I don't run Adguard on my desktop so I can't verify. I did verify the
buttons display properly in Safari with Adguard protection disabled and
when I enable it again the buttons are filtered. Can you recommend a
debugging approach I can use to identify the specific filter. I have both
Safari protection and Advanced protection enabled. I don't think the DNS
protection is causing it. I can disable that and still observe the
behavior. I have the base filter and mobile ads filter enabled on the base
group and the tracking filter protection enabled. That's it plus the
advanced filtering.

On Fri, Jan 5, 2024 at 2:31 PM Sergey ***@***.***> wrote:

> Hello @ukchucktown <https://github.com/ukchucktown>
> Unfortunately, I can't open this page to check it out. Which filter causes
> the issue? Does the problem reproduce on the desktop computer?

issue.title: HollywoodReporter.com - Blocked videos (AdGuard Cookie Notices filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.54.1rc1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/video/breaking-down-5-revelations-you-wont-believe-about-game-of-thrones-prequel-house-of-the-dragon-heat-vision-breakdown/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/`

### Issue:
Some videos won't play, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.

### Example:
`https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/video/breaking-down-5-revelations-you-wont-believe-about-game-of-thrones-prequel-house-of-the-dragon-heat-vision-breakdown/`

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rules:
`###onetrust-consent-sdk`
`||cookielaw.org^$third-party`

### Possible fix:
```
hollywoodreporter.com#@##onetrust-consent-sdk
@@||cdn.cookielaw.org/scripttemplates/otSDKStub.js$domain=hollywoodreporter.com
```

### Other problem filters:
* **EasyList** / **EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18206/

* ~~**uBlock filters - Unbreak** https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/21790/~~ _**(FIXED)**_

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v121.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.54.1rc1
